column4: hi, whats the best way to upgrade ubuntu on an eeepc...seeing that the most free space I can get is 1.4GB....
install bleachbit and use all the options that arent said to be slow, close as many apps as you can to maximise effectiveness, also remove any old kernels you no longer use
use the same way as a desktop to upgrade: sudo apt-get update; sudo apt-get upgrade; sudo apt-get dist-upgrade; sudo apt-get clean
